verbs.description: sweet onion [V: creamed] [ARG1: corn] a friend from church gave me this easy and delicious recipe over 40 years ago and i still make it regularly she was from the south and whenever i cook it i think about her fondly —nancy heishman las vegas nevada cook sweet onion onion
